title: He Maketh Me To Lie Down
lyrics:
He maketh me to lie down
In green pastures,
Leave, O leave,
O leave me not alone.
Leave O, Leave,
O leave me not alone,
Leave, O leave,
O leave me not alone,
He's my Shepherd
I shall not want.
l'm gonna sing, sing, sing,
|m gonna shout, shout, shout,
I'm gonna sing, I'm gonna shout
Praise the Lord,
